titles.title: A bill to prohibit the disposal of solid waste in any State other than the State in which the waste was generated.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 5/12/1987--Introduced. Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to prohibit the disposal of solid waste in excess of 100 pounds in any State other than the State in which the waste was generated.
